description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级党和国家领导人，长期担任财经工作领导职务。曾任中共第十三届中央政治局常委、国务院副总理。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a former national-level leader, and a long-term leader in economic and financial affairs. He served as a member of the 13th Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP and a Vice Premier of the State Council.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家计划委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家计划委员会
en: State Planning Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，负责国家经济计划。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national economic planning.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理
en: Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的副职领导人职务。
description.en: The deputy leadership position of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅
en: General Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国商业部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国商业部
en: Ministry of Commerce of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，主管国内外贸易和国际经济合作。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for domestic and foreign trade and international economic cooperation.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林的第一任妻子。
description.en: The first wife of Yao Yilin.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林的第二任妻子，在姚依林晚年与其共同生活。
description.en: The second wife of Yao Yilin, who lived with him in his later years.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林与周彬的长女。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Yao Yilin and Zhou Bin.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林与周彬的儿子。
description.en: The son of Yao Yilin and Zhou Bin.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林与周彬的二女儿，王岐山之妻。
description.en: The second daughter of Yao Yilin and Zhou Bin, wife of Wang Qishan.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林与周彬的三女儿。
description.en: The third daughter of Yao Yilin and Zhou Bin.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席、中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Vice President of the People's Republic of China and former member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任北京市长、山西省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Mayor of Beijing and Governor of Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的著名高等学府。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education located in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的主要组成兵种。
description.en: The main component of the People's Liberation Army of China.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30年代至40年代，中国抵抗大日本帝国侵略的全面战争。
description.en: A full-scale war fought between China and the Empire of Japan from the 1930s to the 1940s.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的第二次内战。
description.en: The second civil war fought between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China within China.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林之父。
description.en: Father of Yao Yilin.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林之母。
description.en: Mother of Yao Yilin.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林之姐。
description.en: Sister of Yao Yilin.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林的二伯父。
description.en: Yao Yilin's second paternal uncle.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，姚依林的入党介绍人。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China who introduced Yao Yilin to the party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国民族武装自卫委员会

zh-cn: 中国民族武装自卫委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的外围学生运动组织。
description.en: An peripheral student movement organization of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 1935年在中国共产党领导下，北平学生发起的抗日救亡运动。
description.en: An anti-Japanese and national salvation movement initiated by students in Beiping in 1935 under the leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，一二·九运动的组织和指挥者之一。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China and one of the organizers and commanders of the December 9th Movement.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国天津市的著名高等学府。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education located in Tianjin, China.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，在河北东部地区由中国共产党领导的抗日武装起义。
description.en: An anti-Japanese armed uprising led by the Communist Party of China in the eastern Hebei region during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指文化大革命后期，王洪文、张春桥、江青、姚文元在中共中央政治局内结成的政治集团。
description.en: Refers to the political faction composed of Wang Hongwen, Zhang Chunqiao, Jiang Qing, and Yao Wenyuan within the Politburo of the CCP during the later stages of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席、中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指“凡是毛主席作出的决策，我们都坚决维护，凡是毛主席的指示，我们都始终不渝地遵循”的政治方针，由华国锋提出。
description.en: Refers to the political principle of "We will resolutely uphold whatever policy decisions Chairman Mao made, and we will unswervingly follow whatever instructions Chairman Mao gave," proposed by Hua Guofeng.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共八大元老之一。
description.en: Chinese politician, one of the Eight Elders of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国的一系列学生和民众示威活动，最终以军队清场结束。
description.en: A series of student and popular demonstrations in China in 1989, which ended with a military crackdown.

description.zh-cn: 1992年邓小平视察中国南方，发表了一系列推动改革开放的讲话。
description.en: In 1992, Deng Xiaoping inspected southern China and delivered a series of speeches promoting reform and opening up.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席、总书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Chairman and General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林的三女婿，姚明端之夫。
description.en: Yao Yilin's third son-in-law, husband of Yao Mingduan.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 姚依林在中共十三届一中全会上当选为中央政治局常委。
description.en: Yao Yilin was elected as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee at the First Plenary Session of the 13th Central Committee of the CCP.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家计划委员会

description.zh-cn: 姚依林曾两度担任国家计划委员会主任。
description.en: Yao Yilin served twice as the Director of the State Planning Commission.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

description.zh-cn: 姚依林长期担任国务院副总理，分管经济工作。
description.en: Yao Yilin served as Vice Premier of the State Council for a long time, in charge of economic work.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅
中华人民共和国商业部

description.zh-cn: 周彬是姚依林的第一任妻子。
description.en: Zhou Bin was the first wife of Yao Yilin.

description.zh-cn: 在第一任妻子周彬去世后，姚依林与洪寿子共同生活。
description.en: After the death of his first wife Zhou Bin, Yao Yilin lived with Hong Shouzi.

description.zh-cn: 1934年考入清华大学化学系。
description.en: Admitted to the Department of Chemistry at Tsinghua University in 1934.

description.zh-cn: 1937年左右考入南开大学经济系学习。
description.en: Enrolled in the Department of Economics at Nankai University around 1937.

description.zh-cn: 服役期间参与了中国抗日战争和第二次国共内战。
description.en: During his service, he participated in the Second Sino-Japanese War and the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 姚捷勋是姚依林的父亲。
description.en: Yao Jiexun is the father of Yao Yilin.

description.zh-cn: 蔡亦民是姚依林的母亲。
description.en: Cai Yimin is the mother of Yao Yilin.

description.zh-cn: 姚绍枝是姚依林的二伯父。
description.en: Yao Shaozhi was Yao Yilin's second paternal uncle.

description.zh-cn: 1935年11月经周小舟介绍加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in November 1935, introduced by Zhou Xiaozhou.

description.zh-cn: 周小舟介绍姚依林加入中国共产党。
description.en: Zhou Xiaozhou introduced Yao Yilin to join the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林是一二·九运动的主要组织和指挥者之一。
description.en: Yao Yilin was one of the main organizers and commanders of the December 9th Movement.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林在文化大革命期间受到严重迫害，直到1973年才复出工作。
description.en: Yao Yilin was severely persecuted during the Cultural Revolution and did not return to work until 1973.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林在对外贸易部工作期间，抵制了“四人帮”对工作的干扰破坏。
description.en: While working at the Ministry of Foreign Trade, Yao Yilin resisted the interference and sabotage of the "Gang of Four".

description.zh-cn: 姚依林反对华国锋提出的“两个凡是”方针。
description.en: Yao Yilin opposed the "Two Whatevers" policy proposed by Hua Guofeng.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林积极支持并投入真理标准问题讨论，反对“两个凡是”。
description.en: Yao Yilin actively supported and participated in the discussion on the criterion of truth, opposing the 'Two Whatevers'.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林任国务院财政经济委员会秘书长，协助副总理陈云、李先念工作。
description.en: Yao Yilin served as Secretary-General of the State Council's Financial and Economic Commission, assisting Vice Premiers Chen Yun and Li Xiannian.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林任国务院财政经济委员会秘书长，协助副总理陈云、李先念工作。
description.en: Yao Yilin served as Secretary-General of the State Council's Financial and Economic Commission, assisting Vice Premiers Chen Yun and Li Xiannian.

description.zh-cn: 在六四天安门事件期间，姚依林坚决支持时任总理李鹏采取军事镇压的决定。
description.en: During the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, Yao Yilin firmly supported Premier Li Peng's decision to use military force.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林坚决支持对学生运动采取军事镇压，是唯一一位没有与学生对话的政治局常委。
description.en: Yao Yilin firmly supported the military suppression of the student movement and was the only Politburo Standing Committee member who did not engage in dialogue with the students.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平南巡讲话后，改革开放重新提速，被外界视为保守派的姚依林随后卸任退休。
description.en: After Deng Xiaoping's southern tour speeches, reform and opening up accelerated, and Yao Yilin, seen by outsiders as a conservative, subsequently stepped down and retired.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林在担任国家计划委员会主任、国务院副总理和中央政治局常委期间，曾是时任总理、总书记赵紫阳的下属。
description.en: During his tenures as Director of the State Planning Commission, Vice Premier, and member of the Politburo Standing Committee, Yao Yilin was a subordinate of then-Premier and General Secretary Zhao Ziyang.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林担任中央政治局常委期间，江泽民是中共中央总书记。
description.en: While Yao Yilin was a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, Jiang Zemin was the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林在担任国家计划委员会主任和国务院副总理期间，李鹏是国务院总理。
description.en: While Yao Yilin served as Director of the State Planning Commission and Vice Premier, Li Peng was the Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林在担任中央办公厅主任、商业部长和国务院副总理期间，华国锋是党主席或国务院总理。
description.en: While Yao Yilin served as Director of the General Office of the Central Committee, Minister of Commerce, and Vice Premier, Hua Guofeng was the Party Chairman or Premier.

description.zh-cn: 姚依林担任中央办公厅主任期间，胡耀邦是中共中央主席。
description.en: While Yao Yilin was Director of the General Office of the Central Committee, Hu Yaobang was the Chairman of the CCP Central Committee.
